title: GTA San Andreas 2014 HD [ENG] SAMP 0.3z - Portable beta 1.66 - M
description:
heheszki.

It's my GTA SA +SAMP 0.3z - portable, modded by me

*********************************
Instructions:
1. Download GTA_SA_BY_uG.KaiN_[C][FS].zip
2. Extract, run install.exe
3. Install anywhere(be wise ^^)
4. READ CAREFULLY EVERYTHING. In the installation you have choice for installing normal(not modded) GTA or HD(with all the best mods)[Take HD if you got better graphic card than intel gma:D]
5. RUN&SEED

*********************************
Positives:
*Small usage of system resources
*FULL HD TEXTURES 
*amazing effects, best cars
*Doesn't lag (as far as you don't have internet from virgin mobile:P)

Neutrals:
*Don't change the graphics details if you chose HD textures in the installer

badbad things:
*ENB: If u installed enb, on some computers you need to click escape before minimalising or your HUD will dissapear
*You need to find the folder of my version of GTA when you want to run GTA:SAMP

*****************

|||ChangeLog 10.03.2014 Beta 1.66
*New installer: To choose: low quality textures and HD textures and HD textured with ENB(third option is risky, can cause problems. recommended one: just HD)
*Repaired bugs, added new ones(kidding:p) (thx testerzy;<)
*added reflections pack
*repaired sniper rifle
*cars r so amazing:o


**********************************
Size of gta3.img: 3.62GB HD  896MB LR
Size after installation: ~5-10GB
Installed SAMP: 0.3z R1 + keybind (configure urself:>)

Tested on: Win 7 x64 SP1 home basic N, AMD FX-4100 4 * 3.8Ghz, Club3d Radeon HD7770 1GB, 4GB RAM DDR3 1666Mhz.

**********************************
